## Build output
bin/
obj/

## User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Rider
.idea/

## VS Code
.vscode/

## ASP.NET secrets (local dev)
secrets.json

## Log files
*.log

## Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
~$*

## IIS Express
.vs/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

## Package files
packages/
*.nupkg
*.snupkg

## Test results
TestResults/

## Publish output
publish/
out/

## Environment files
.env
*.env.*

## SQLite or other local DBs (if used)
*.db
*.sqlite

## Auto-generated Swagger/OpenAPI files (if applicable)
swagger.json
swagger/

## User uploaded files (if stored locally)
wwwroot/uploads/
uploads/

## JetBrains Rider
*.DotSettings.user

## Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

## Coverage reports (e.g. coverlet)
coverage.*
